The Comet ethner marks a milestone

tis the world's hrst let liner and

Cruising at nearly 500 miles per hour,

normal operational altitude

fascinating panorama unfolds
itself through the cabin window.

properties.sfomuseum:description: Brochure issued by British Overseas Airways Corporation (BOAC) promoting de Havilland D.H.106 Comet service, titled "BOAC introduces the newest, fastest airliner in the world / The Comet Jetliner"; cover includes illustration of a globe with jet; interior features cutaway drawings and photos of the airplane, passengers and cabin.
